info.name: CoopStore Management - API Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for CoopStore Management System

**Base URL**: {{base_url}}/api/v1
**Authentication**: Laravel Sanctum (Bearer Token)
**Currency**: PHP (Philippine Peso - stored as centavos)
**Timezone**: Asia/Manila

## Authentication
1. Login via `/auth/login` to get a Bearer token
2. Use the token in all protected endpoints: `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

## Important Notes
- All monetary values in request bodies are in **pesos** (converted to centavos internally)
- Multi-tenant system (data filtered by store_id)
- Activity logging enabled on all operations

## MPC Modules (Cooperative-specific)
- Share Capital, Loans, Savings, Time Deposits
- Patronage Refunds, Memberships
- CDA Compliance, MAF (Mutual Aid Fund)

item.name: 1. Authentication

request.description: Authenticate user and receive Bearer token

item.description: Authentication endpoints for login, logout, password management

request.description: Get paginated list of products with optional filters
Fast search for POS - search by name, SKU, or barcode
Lookup product by barcode for POS scanning
Adjust product stock (type: add or subtract)
Get all units of measure (not paginated)

item.name: 5. Sales (POS)

request.description: Send receipt via email or SMS

item.description: Point of Sale and sales management

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Juan dela Cruz Hardware",
    "type": "regular",
    "phone": "09171234567",
    "email": "juan@example.com",
    "address": "123 Main Street, Manila",
    "credit_limit": 10000000,
    "credit_terms_days": 30,
    "business_name": "JDC Hardware Supplies",
    "is_active": true
}

request.description: Record customer payment (auto-allocates FIFO if no invoice_ids)
Get all dashboard data in one call

body.raw:
{
    "name": "ABC Hardware Supplier",
    "contact_person": "John Doe",
    "email": "john@abc.com",
    "phone": "09271234567",
    "address": "456 Supply Avenue, Quezon City",
    "payment_terms_days": 30
}

request.description: Link product to supplier with pricing
Mark PO as received and update stock
Get sales summary with date range

body.raw:
{
    "header_text": "Thank you for your purchase!",
    "footer_text": "Please come again",
    "show_logo": true,
    "show_tin": true,
    "show_address": true
}

item.name: 13. Accounts Payable (AP)

request.description: Get accounts payable overview statistics including total outstanding, suppliers with balance, total purchases, and average payment terms
Get accounts payable aging report with 4 buckets (current, 31-60 days, 61-90 days, over 90 days)

query.description: Number of days to look ahead (1-365)

request.description: Get upcoming payments due to suppliers
Get report of payments made to suppliers in date range, grouped by payment method
Get supplier's payable transactions (invoices, payments, adjustments)
Get supplier's AP ledger (alias for payables)

Make payment to supplier with FIFO allocation. Amount in centavos (250000 = 2,500). Payment methods: cash, bank_transfer, check, online. If invoice_ids not provided, payment allocated to oldest invoices (FIFO).
Get supplier statement for date range (JSON format)

item.description: Accounts Payable management - Track supplier invoices, payments, aging analysis, and statements. Features FIFO payment allocation and 4-bucket aging reports. All data returned as JSON for frontend processing.

item.name: 14. Share Capital
item.description: Member share capital management  subscriptions, payments, certificates, ISC computation, and withdrawals.

request.description: Compute interest on share capital for a given year and dividend rate
Get paginated list of member share accounts
Open a new member share capital account
Update share capital account notes or status
List all payments for a share account

item.name: 15. Loan Products
item.description: Loan product configuration  define loan types, interest rates, terms, and eligibility rules.

body.raw:
{
    "code": "REG-LOAN",
    "name": "Regular Loan",
    "description": "Standard multipurpose loan for regular members",
    "loan_type": "regular",
    "interest_rate": 12.0,
    "max_term_months": 24,
    "min_amount": 1000.00,
    "max_amount": 50000.00,
    "processing_fee_rate": 1.0,
    "service_fee": 50.00,
    "requires_collateral": false,
    "is_active": true
}

request.description: Delete a loan product (only if no active loans)

item.name: 16. Loans
item.description: Cooperative lending module  loan applications, approvals, disbursements, payments, penalties, and delinquency tracking.

request.description: Loan aging analysis (current, 1-30, 31-90, 91-180, 180+ days past due)
Preview amortization schedule before creating a loan
Get loan details with amortization schedule
Update loan application details (pending status only)
Record a loan payment (applies to principal, interest, penalties in order)
List all payments for a loan
Get full amortization schedule with payment status per period
Compute outstanding penalties for overdue amortizations

item.name: 17. Savings
item.description: Member savings accounts  voluntary and compulsory deposits, withdrawals, interest crediting, and account closure.

request.description: Batch credit interest to all active savings accounts
Get paginated list of member savings accounts
Open a new member savings account
Close a savings account and disburse remaining balance

item.name: 18. Time Deposits
item.description: Time deposit management  placement, interest accrual, maturity, pre-termination, and rollover.

request.description: Preview interest earnings before creating a time deposit

query.description: Show deposits maturing within N days

request.description: Get paginated list of time deposits
Create a new time deposit placement
Pre-terminate a time deposit (penalty may apply)
Rollover a matured time deposit into a new placement

item.name: 19. Patronage Refunds
item.description: Patronage refund computation and distribution  compute member refunds based on purchase/savings activity, approve batches, and disburse allocations.

request.description: Create a new patronage refund batch
Trigger patronage refund computation for all eligible members
Approve the computed patronage refund batch

item.name: 20. Memberships
item.description: Member enrollment and lifecycle  applications, approvals, status transitions (deactivate, reinstate, expel, resign), and membership fees.

request.description: List all members with their current status
Expel a member from the cooperative

item.name: 21. CDA Compliance
item.description: Cooperative Development Authority (CDA) compliance  annual reports, Annual General Assembly (AGA) records, and officers/board of directors.

request.description: Compile/generate CDA annual report from system data
Finalize the CDA annual report (locks from further editing)
Mark a finalized report as submitted to CDA
Get raw statistical data used in the CDA annual report

body.raw:
{
    "meeting_type": "annual",
    "meeting_year": 2025,
    "meeting_date": "2025-03-15",
    "venue": "Cooperative Hall, Main Building",
    "total_members": 250,
    "members_present": 180,
    "members_via_proxy": 20,
    "quorum_achieved": true,
    "presiding_officer": "Juan Dela Cruz",
    "secretary": "Maria Santos",
    "agenda": ["Reading of previous minutes", "Financial report", "Election of officers"],
    "resolutions_passed": ["Resolution 2025-01: Approved FY2024 financial statements"],
    "minutes_text": "Full minutes text here...",
    "notes": ""
}

request.description: Create an Annual General Assembly record
List cooperative officers and board of directors
Add a cooperative officer or board member

item.name: 22. MAF (Mutual Aid Fund)
item.description: Mutual Aid Fund management  benefit programs, member contributions, claims processing (death, disability, hospitalization), and member beneficiary management.

request.description: Get MAF fund statistics and balance
Get claims report for a date range

body.raw:
{
    "code": "MAF-DEATH",
    "name": "Death Benefit",
    "description": "Benefit for deceased members and their beneficiaries",
    "benefit_type": "death",
    "benefit_amount": 20000.00,
    "waiting_period_days": 90,
    "max_claims_per_year": 1,
    "is_active": true
}

request.description: Create a new MAF benefit program
Delete a benefit program (only if no claims)

body.raw:
{
    "customer_uuid": "member-uuid",
    "maf_program_uuid": "program-uuid",
    "beneficiary_uuid": "beneficiary-uuid",
    "incident_date": "2025-01-10",
    "claim_date": "2025-01-12",
    "incident_description": "Member passed away due to natural causes",
    "claimed_amount": 20000.00,
    "supporting_documents": ["death-certificate.pdf"],
    "notes": ""
}

request.description: Get MAF contributions for a specific member
Get MAF claims filed by a specific member
Get MAF beneficiaries registered under a member
Add a MAF beneficiary for a member
